desc: Recovers HP each turn, adds chance of HP recovery when damaged & 15% boost to Atk, Def, Rec and max HP

dictionary.lore: A special Sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab, Noel. A byproduct of his research concerning mock Units, this orb is also part of the Heresy Series. Though mainly created for the purpose of increasing the survival chances of the wearer, it also has great healing properties that may restore HP when damage is taken.

name: Fallacy Orb
